verses.text: Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w certain|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto me, and \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me.
And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, these \w men|strong="H0582"\w* have set \w up|strong="H5927"\w* their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* in their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w stumblingblock|strong="H4383"\w* of their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w before|strong="H5227"\w* their \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: should I be \w enquired|strong="H1875"\w* of at \w all|strong="H1875"\w* by them?

Therefore \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; Every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that setteth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* his \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and \w putteth|strong="H7760"\w* the \w stumblingblock|strong="H4383"\w* of his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w before|strong="H5227"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*; I the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* him that \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* according to the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of his \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*;

That I may \w take|strong="H8610"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in their own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, because they are all \w estranged|strong="H2114"\w* from me through their \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*.

¶ Therefore \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \w Repent|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \add yourselves\add* from your \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*; and turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* your \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* from all your \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*.\f + \fr 14.6 \ft yourselves: or, others\f*

For every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, or of the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which \w separateth|strong="H5144"\w* himself from \w me|strong="H0310"\w*, and setteth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* his \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and \w putteth|strong="H7760"\w* the \w stumblingblock|strong="H4383"\w* of his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w before|strong="H5227"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* to a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* to \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of him concerning me; I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* him by myself:

And I will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against that \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and will \w make|strong="H8074"\w* him a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* and a \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w*, and I will cut him \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And if the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* be \w deceived|strong="H6601"\w* when he hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* a \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w deceived|strong="H6601"\w* that \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, and I will stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon him, and will \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* him from the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And they shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the punishment of their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*: the \w punishment|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* shall be even as the \w punishment|strong="H5771"\w* of him that \w seeketh|strong="H1875"\w* \add unto him;\add*

That the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* may go no more \w astray|strong="H8582"\w* from \w me|strong="H0310"\w*, neither be \w polluted|strong="H2930"\w* any more with all their \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*; but that they may be my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I may be their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
¶ The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came again to me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, when the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w sinneth|strong="H2398"\w* against me by \w trespassing|strong="H4603"\w* \w grievously|strong="H4604"\w*, then will I stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon it, and will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* the \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* thereof, and will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* upon it, and will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* from it:

Though these \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w*, \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, and \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*, were in \w it|strong="H8432"\w*, they should \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \add but\add* their own \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* by their \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

¶ \w If|strong="H3863"\w* I cause \w noisome|strong="H7451"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* to pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and they \w spoil|strong="H7921"\w* it, so that it be \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, that no man may pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w*:\f + \fr 14.15 \ft spoil: or, bereave\f*

\add Though\add* these \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add were\add* in \w it|strong="H8432"\w*, \add as\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, they shall \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* neither \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* nor \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*; they only shall be \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w*, but the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*.\f + \fr 14.16 \ft in it: Heb. in the midst of it\f*

¶ Or \add if\add* I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* upon that \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Sword|strong="H2719"\w*, go \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; so that I cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* from it:

Though these \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add were\add* in \w it|strong="H8432"\w*, \add as\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, they shall \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* neither \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* nor \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, but they only shall be \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* themselves.

¶ Or \add if\add* I \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w* into that \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* upon it in \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, to cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from it \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*:

Though \w Noah|strong="H5146"\w*, \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, and \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*, \add were\add* in \w it|strong="H8432"\w*, \add as\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, they shall \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* neither \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w nor|strong="H0518"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*; they shall \add but\add* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* their own \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* by their \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; How much more when I \w send|strong="H7971"\w* my \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w sore|strong="H7451"\w* \w judgments|strong="H8201"\w* upon \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and the \w noisome|strong="H7451"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w*, and the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, to cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from it \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*?\f + \fr 14.21 \ft How…: or, Also when\f*

¶ Yet, behold, therein shall be \w left|strong="H3498"\w* a \w remnant|strong="H6413"\w* that shall be brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, \add both\add* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: behold, they shall come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* unto you, and ye shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* their \w way|strong="H1870"\w* and their \w doings|strong="H5949"\w*: and ye shall be \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* concerning the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that I have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* upon \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \add even\add* concerning all that I have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* upon it.

And they shall \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* you, when ye \w see|strong="H7200"\w* their \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* and their \w doings|strong="H5949"\w*: and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I have not \w done|strong="H6213"\w* without \w cause|strong="H2600"\w* all that I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* in it, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
